/*kr.happy.study.sales.dao.DdRevenueDao.DdRevenueModel*/ select count(*) from tb_dtlor dor inner join tb_order o on o.ord_no = dor.ord_no
and o.cop_no like (#{cilall})
and do_date >= STR_TO_DATE(#{from_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and do_date <= STR_TO_DATE(#{to_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')

select bt.bi_nm , sum(sit.si_price * dor.do_nmt) as sumtotal from tb_order o inner join tb_dtlor dor on o.ord_no = dor.ord_no inner join tb_company cop on o.cop_no = cop.cop_no inner join tb_sitem sit on sit.si_cd = dor.si_cd inner join tb_bitem bt on bt.bi_cd = sit.bi_cd
and o.cop_no like (#{cilall})
and do_date >= STR_TO_DATE(#{from_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and do_date <= STR_TO_DATE(#{to_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
group by bt.bi_nm order by o.ord_no , bt.bi_nm DESC

select bt.bi_nm , sum(sit.si_price * dor.do_nmt) as sumtotal from tb_order o inner join tb_dtlor dor on o.ord_no = dor.ord_no inner join tb_company cop on o.cop_no = cop.cop_no inner join tb_sitem sit on sit.si_cd = dor.si_cd inner join tb_bitem bt on bt.bi_cd = sit.bi_cd
and o.cop_no like (#{cilall})
and do_date >= STR_TO_DATE(#{from_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and do_date <= STR_TO_DATE(#{to_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
group by bt.bi_nm order by o.ord_no , bt.bi_nm DESC

select cop.cop_nm , sit.si_nm , sum(sit.si_price * dor.do_nmt) as total from tb_order o inner join tb_dtlor dor on o.ord_no = dor.ord_no inner join tb_company cop on o.cop_no = cop.cop_no inner join tb_sitem sit on sit.si_cd = dor.si_cd inner join tb_bitem bt on bt.bi_cd = sit.bi_cd
and o.cop_no like (#{cilall})
and do_date >= STR_TO_DATE(#{from_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and do_date <= STR_TO_DATE(#{to_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
group by cop.cop_nm , sit.si_nm order by total DESC;

select count(*) from ( select sum(sit.si_price * dor.do_nmt) as total from tb_order o inner join tb_dtlor dor on o.ord_no = dor.ord_no inner join tb_company cop on o.cop_no = cop.cop_no inner join tb_sitem sit on sit.si_cd = dor.si_cd inner join tb_bitem bt on bt.bi_cd = sit.bi_cd
and o.cop_no like (#{cilall})
and do_date >= STR_TO_DATE(#{from_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and do_date <= STR_TO_DATE(#{to_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
group by cop.cop_nm , sit.si_nm )ll;
